name: Pyxniel
aura: Increases Ally RESIST in Arena Battles by 80.

skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a [Veil] buff on a random ally for 1 turn. Cannot place the [Veil] buff on this Champion.

Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff and a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on all allies for 2 turns, then attacks all enemies under [Freeze] debuff. Places a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns on all enemies under [Freeze] debuff.
Attacks 5 times at random. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn. Has a 100% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff on enemies that receive 2 hits.

Whenever an enemy places a [Freeze] debuff on an ally, has a 20% chance of stealing the [Freeze] debuff and placing it on this Champion instead. Has a 25% chance of filling this Championâ€™s Turn Meter by 25% every time they receive a [Freeze] debuff. Has a 35% chance of removing any [Freeze] debuff from this Champion at the start of every turn. If there are multiple Champions in the team with this Skill, only one will activate.
